channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 01:19 Air alarm in the city Kyiv Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 01:19 Air alarm in the city Kyiv Stay tuned for further messages. #m_Kyiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
